conversation.content:
riassumi in 1000 parole il seguente testo: I flussi che abbiamo esaminato nel paragrafo precedente vengono sistematicamente rilevati dagli uffici nazionali di statistica e presentati in una struttura coerente di conti economici del Paese. L'analisi dei conti del Paese ci permette di rafforzare e di precisare i concetti sviluppati nel paragrafo precedente, oltre che di avere un'idea più precisa dell'entità dei flussi di cui stiamo discutendo. Ogni conto contrassegna un particolare circuito economico e genera a saldo un aggregato significativo per l'analisi economica. I conti sono costituiti da due sezioni uscite nella parte sinistra ed entrate nella parte destra. Per assicurare la coerenza contabile, la registrazione dei flussi segue le regole della partita doppia: ciascun flusso viene registrato una volta in uscita in un conto e un'altra volta in entrata in un altro conto.
Esaminiamo dettagliatamente i singoli conti e la natura dei flussi che li compongono. Il conto delle risorse e degli impieghi rappresenta il mercato dei beni e servizi finali e ne mette in evidenza l'offerta aggregata (risorse) e la domanda aggregata (impieghi). L'offerta aggregata, cioè l'insieme dei beni e servizi di cui il Paese può disporre, non può evidentemente che essere uguale ai beni e servizi finali prodotti all'interno del Paese più i beni importati. I beni e servizi prodotti all'interno del Paese prendono il nome di Prodotto Interno Lordo (PIL) e la sigla pdm sta a indicare che essi sono stati valutati ai prezzi di mercato.
La sezione delle entrate specifica come sono state utilizzate le risorse. La parte preponderante è stata impiegata per consumi dalle famiglie e dalle P.A. Gli investimenti lordi si compongono di due voci: gli investimenti fissi lordi e la variazione delle scorte.

Gli investimenti fissi lordi sono costituiti da macchinari, attrezzature, fabbricati, mezzi di trasporto commerciali ecc. L'aggettivo lordo, applicato a questo e ad altri aggregati di contabilità nazionale, vuol dire che sono al lordo degli ammortamenti, cioè del consumo di beni capitali verificatosi nel corso del processo produttivo appena conclusosi e che occorre reintegrare per mantenere inalterata la capacità produttiva.

La variazione delle scorte esprime la differenza fra il valore delle scorte detenute dalle imprese alla fine dell'anno e quello delle scorte presenti nei magazzini all'inizio del periodo. Se a fine periodo le scorte sono aumentate rispetto alla consistenza iniziale, ciò vuol dire che una parte della produzione dell'anno non ha (ancora) trovato una collocazione sul mercato. Ciò può essere avvenuto o perché le imprese hanno volontariamente deciso di aumentare le consistenze di magazzino, per esempio in previsione di una domanda più elevata in futuro, o perché hanno sbagliato i calcoli sulla effettiva volontà di acqui- sto degli acquirenti.
La volontarietà o meno dell'accumulo delle scorte da parte delle imprese gioca un ruolo importante nella determinazione del livello futuro di attività del sistema economico: se l'accumulo di scorte è stato subito e non voluto dalle imprese, queste ridurranno il livello di produzione nel periodo successivo. Viceversa, se la variazione delle scorte ha segno negativo, ciò può voler dire o che le imprese ritenevano di avere magazzini troppo pieni e hanno programmato una produzione ridotta per l'anno in corso, o che la domanda è stata così vivace che la produzione del periodo non è stata sufficiente a soddisfarla e le imprese aumenteranno i prezzi e/o programmeranno un livello di produzione più elevato per il periodo successivo. In altri termini, affinché il mercato dei beni sia in equilibrio occorre che la produzione programmata dalle imprese sia uguale alla domanda programmata dagli acquirenti. Rinviamo ai capitoli successivi per una trattazione approfondita di questo problema e dei relativi meccanismi di aggiustamento.
Qui annotiamo soltanto che in contabilità nazionale ci si limita a registrare il valore della variazione delle scorte, senza tentare di distinguere se la variazione è stata programmata o meno dalle imprese. Di conseguenza, il conto delle risorse e degli impieghi è sempre in equilibrio.
L'ultima componente della domanda aggregata è costituita dalle esportazioni.
Abbiamo già accennato come in presenza di  una parte del prezzo pagato dagli acquirenti finali venga trasferita allo stato non vada a remunerare i fattori produttivi. Un'ulteriore complicazione deriva dal fatto che in alcuni casi lo Stato decide di sussidiare alcune productions. I molvi di questa decisione possono essere vari: indurre le imprese a praticare prezzi più bassi per alcuni beni di cui si ritiene uti le incentivare il consumo o sostenere i redditi di alcune categorie di produttori con derati meritevoli di particolari attenzioni. Questi sussidi prendono il nome di contributi alla produzione e in delineava permettono di remunerare fato al di sopra di quanto consentito dal ricavi di vendita Quindi, per passare dal concetto di valore della produzione finale al concetto di redditi dei fattori occorre tener conto di queste due poste correttive
Il conto della distribuzione del PIL parte dal Pitpdm, aggiunge a contribu alla produzione versati dalle amministrazioni nazionali e dall'Unione Europea e sono tre.
Questa nazione di prodotto interno lordo al costo dei fattori coincide esattamente con i redditi guadagnati dai fattori produttivi che hanno contribuito alla sua realizzazione.
A questo punto il conto opera una parziale distribuzione funzionale del reddito distinguendo tra redditi interni da lavoro dipendente e risultato lordo di gestione. Quest'ultimo aggregato racchiude gli interessi, i profitti, le rendite, ma anche redditi da lavoro autonomo: Il motivo dell'inclusione dei redditi da lavoro autonomo nel risultato lordo di gestione e dovuto al fatto che per i lavoratori autonomi è dif cile distinguere quanta parte del loro reddito complessivo è dovuta al loro lavoro e quanta parte deriva invece dalla proprietà dei beni capitali che impiegano nella loro attività Tutti i reddin sono rilevati al lordo del contributi sociali e delle imposte dirette
cioè della parte che dovrà essere versata allo Stato. Il canto del reddito si propone di determinare il reddito nazionale. In contabi
Il conto del reddito si propone di determinare il reddito nazionale. In contabilità nazionale l'aggettivo interno sta a indicare le attività economiche svolte da tutti i soggetti che operano all'interno del territorio economico del Paese, mentre l'aggettivo nazionale designa le attività dei soggetti che hanno il centro dei propri interessi nel Paese. Il centro di interessi è identificato con la residenza e non con la cittadinanza.
Per esemplificare, ciò significa che un lavoratore immigrato stabilmente nel nostro Paese svolge la sua attività di produzione e di consumo in Italia e contribuisce quindi all'economia nazionale, mentre un cittadino italiano che risiede stabilmente In Argentina contribuisce all'economia di quel Paese. Il conto del reddito mette quindi in evidenza i redditi guadagnati dalle famiglie residenti nel Paese e le entrate delle Pubbliche Amministrazioni nazionali. Il conto del reddito presenta nella sezione delle entrate gli aggregati che costituiscono le componenti positive del reddito e nella sezione delle uscite le componenti negative. Il punto di partenza è costituito dai redditi interni da lavoro dipendente e dal risultato lordo di gestione. È evidente che buona parte dei redditi distribuiti dalle unità produttive del Paese apparterranno a famiglie residenti. Tuttavia le imprese possono aver utilizzato lavoro e capitale esteri. I salari e dividendi pagati a questi lavoratori e a queste famiglie estere devono essere dunque sottratti al complesso dei redditi risultanti dall'attività di produzione. I due aggregati "redditi da lavoro dipendente verso l'estero" e "redditi da capitale verso l'estero", posti nella sezione opposta a quella del risultato lordo di gestione e dei redditi interni da lavoro dipendente, servono a effettuare questa correzione. Le famiglie residenti, dal canto loro, possono aver prestato servizi dei fattori produttivi a imprese operanti sul territorio economico di altri Paesi. I relativi redditi devono essere aggiunti a quelli che le famiglie residenti hanno percepito dalle imprese che operano nel Paese e questa correzione viene effettuata dai due aggregati "redditi da lavoro dipendente" e "redditi da capitale" dal RdM.
Un'ulteriore correzione deve essere effettuata per tener conto delle imposte indi- rette e dei contributi alla produzione. Come si ricorderà, i redditi da lavoro dipendente e il risultato lordo di gestione sono registrati al lordo delle imposte dirette e dei contri- buti sociali. In quanto tali, essi possono essere visti come la somma dei redditi che rimangono effettivamente a disposizione delle famiglie residenti e delle entrate dello Stato per imposte dirette e contributi sociali. Ma tra le entrate dello Stato vanno annoverate anche le imposte indirette. che erano state scorporate nel conto della distribuzione del PIL e quindi vanno aggiunte alle componenti positive del reddito nazionale. Parallelamente devono essere sottratti i contributi alla produzione pagati dalle Pubbliche Amministrazioni nazionali, perché nel conto della distribuzione del PIL sono già stati considerati come una componente positiva dei redditi distribuiti dalle imprese.
Altre due voci che troviamo nel conto riguardano i trasferimenti correnti da e verso l'estero. Questi trasferimenti sono costituiti dai versamenti in denaro o in natura che avvengono fra Stati o istituzioni internazionali e dai trasferimenti internazionali a titolo gratuito effettuati dai privati. Naturalmente i trasferimenti dall'estero si aggiungono alle componenti positive del reddito, mentre i trasferimenti verso l'estero sono una componente negativa. La differenza fra le uscite e le entrate costituisce il saldo del conto ed è il reddito nazionale lordo disponibile, cioè il reddito delle famiglie residenti e le entrate dello Stato di cui il Paese può disporre. Il conto dell'utilizzazione del reddito mette in evidenza come il Paese utilizza il reddito disponibile. La prima e fondamentale decisione che le famiglie e lo Stato devono prendere è quanta parte destinarne al consumo e quanta parte al risparmio, ed è esattamente quello che mette in evidenza il conto dell'utilizzazione del reddito. Nella sezione delle entrate troviamo il saldo del conto precedente, cioè il reddito nazionale lordo disponibile. Nella sezione opposta troviamo i consumi nazionali e a saldo il risparmio nazionale lordo.
Il conto della formazione di capitale mette in evidenza come vengono finanziati gli investimenti. La prima e principale fonte di finanziamento degli investimenti è costi tuita ovviamente dal risparmio nazionale lordo, che è stato determinato a saldo nel conto precedente. A esso vanno aggiunti i trasferimenti in conto capitale dal resto del mondo, cioè quei trasferimenti dall'estero che hanno come specifica destinazione gli investimenti. Nella sezione opposta vengono dettagliati gli impieghi del risparmio: investimenti fissi lordi, variazione delle scorte e trasferimenti verso il resto del mondo con specifica destinazione agli investimenti. Gli investimenti fissi lordi sono stati distinti nelle due voci che li compongono: gli ammortamenti, cioè l beni capitali che vanno a rimpiazzare il valore stimato dello stock di capitale consumato nel processo produttivo appena conclusosi, e gli investimenti fissi nelti, cioè l'aggiunta netta allo stock di capitale. Se gli investimenti samo stati superiori al risparmio, cio evidentemente è stato possibile grazie a debiti contratti all'estero e il saldo del conto mette in evidenza l'ammontare di questo indebitamento netto verso l'estero. Nel caso contrario il Paese avrebbe risparmiato più di quanto ha investito e il saldo metterebbe in evidenza un accreditamento netto verso l'estero. Il conto delle tromazioni internazionali è il conto di chiusura e riepiloghi le transazioni tra l'economia nazionale e il resto del mondo. Il conto è costruito dal punto di vista del resto del mondo: per esempio le esportazioni  sono una risorsa per il resto del mondo. Il pagamento per i boni che abbiamo esportate determina un flusso monetario in uscita dal RdM e diretto nel nostro Paese.

Lo stesso ragionamento vale per gli altri aggregati raccolti nella sezione delle uscite del conte. D'altro canto, il pagamento delle nostre importazioni rappresenta un'entrata per il RdM. L'aggregato a saldo, accreditamento netto verso l'estero, è lo stesso che abbiamo trovato nel conto della formazione di capitale e segnala che il nostro Paese ha concesso crediti al RdM

I flussi esaminati vengono rilevati dagli uffici nazionali di statistica e presentati in conti economici del Paese, permettendo l'analisi economica attraverso la registrazione dei flussi in uscite e entrate. Il conto delle risorse e degli impieghi rappresenta il mercato dei beni e servizi finali, mettendo in evidenza l'offerta e la domanda aggregata. L'offerta aggregata include il Prodotto Interno Lordo (PIL) e i beni importati, mentre le entrate indicano come sono state utilizzate le risorse.

Gli investimenti fissi lordi sono costituiti da macchinari, attrezzature e altri beni, mentre la variazione delle scorte esprime la differenza fra la consistenza iniziale e finale delle scorte. L'accumulo delle scorte può essere volontario o subito e influisce sul livello futuro di attività del sistema economico.

Il conto della distribuzione del PIL considera i sussidi, imposte e contributi alla produzione, mentre il conto del reddito determina il reddito nazionale e mette in evidenza i redditi guadagnati dalle famiglie residenti e le entrate delle Pubbliche Amministrazioni nazionali.

Il conto dell'utilizzazione del reddito indica come il Paese utilizza il reddito disponibile, distinguendo tra consumo e risparmio, mentre il conto della formazione di capitale mostra come vengono finanziati gli investimenti, considerando risparmio nazionale lordo e trasferimenti in conto capitale.

Il conto delle trasformazioni internazionali riepiloga le transazioni tra l'economia nazionale e il resto del mondo, evidenziando accreditamenti o debitamenti netti verso l'estero.

In sintesi, i conti economici del Paese permettono di analizzare e comprendere i diversi aspetti dell'economia attraverso la registrazione dei flussi nei vari settori e l'analisi delle entrate e uscite.

conversation.content:
Rewrite the text below in one setence:Harem Syndrome.

Nobody really knows the cause, most scientists are baffled, the more fringe scientists suggest latent psychic talents that are interacting with the universe’s morphic fields through unconscious desires. Most reject these claims though. A few suggest it is some sort of blessing from the gods, and others say it’s a curse.

Whatever the reason, Harem Syndrome is a condition that affects men (and the occasional woman) across the multiverse. One day the individual will notice that they are encountering women (and occasionally men) that seem romantically interested in them, often one after the other in short order. This is not a coincidence, instead the harem syndrome is creating an attraction to the effected party or the “harem master.”

Usually this only effects around five or six “members” of the effected's harem, however harems as large as fifty have been reported.

There is a common variant of “resistant” harem members. These resistant will not be truly able to prevent their attraction to the master, instead they will have moments of anger and resentment towards the master. Anything from name calling (idiot and pervert seem to be favourite insults for some reason) to outright physical violence may occur. However these individuals are unable to deny their feelings (or the feelings that have been given to them) and will usually show a great deal of affection towards the master when they let their guard down.

The affected women may experience some changes, either prior to or just after contact with the affected. These may be instant, or take up to several weeks to fully manifest. What these changes are depends on the master, but they will universally become more attractive to the master. In some case, each member of the harem might come to embody a certain archetype that the master enjoys. In more extreme cases every member of the harem might become might start to look similar to one another, and in even more extreme cases completely identical. In even more extreme cases individuals who have nothing to do with the master’s preferences due to gender age might find themselves completely remade to suit the master’s tastes.

The harem members attitude to each other can vary wildly as well. In some cases the girls get along extremely well, even developing a sort of group sexuality wherein all members of the harem will be attracted to all other members of the harem. On the other hand other groups become quite competitive, searching wildly for ways to win over the master’s heart as the master’s “true” love.

Harem Syndrome causes men (and some women) to attract romantic interest from multiple partners, with the condition resulting in the creation of a "harem" of five to fifty members who may experience changes to their appearance or attitude toward one another while resistant members may be unable to deny their attraction and exhibit anger or resentment.

conversations.facetValue: summarize and rewrite given text, avoiding plagiarism.

allFacetValues.value: summarize and rewrite a text, avoiding plagiarism, and providing strategies for identifying and addressing learning gaps in large classrooms.
English
summarize and rewrite given text, avoiding plagiarism.

conversation.content:
summarize and rewrite the following text in order to avoid plagiarism: Identifying & addressing learning gaps
Many students in this year’s incoming class experienced COVID-related academic disruptions, but not every student was affected in the same way. This resulted in significant gaps in student learning, and instructors should be aware that some students may need extra support.

As an instructor, there are several steps you can take to support students and help them adjust to studying at Cornell, including forming connections, identifying gaps and normalizing getting help, and checking in early and assessing student knowledge often.


Form connections
Build a sense of community and belonging early in your course and develop your instructor presence: a sense of connection as a student can help prevent feelings of isolation. Students are more likely to successfully complete the course if they feel connected to you, their classmates, and the course content.
Provide opportunities for students to interact: collaborative activities and icebreakers allow students to get to know each other through sharing experiences, values, and perspectives.
Encourage students to form study groups: explain the importance of a study partner or group and offer opportunities to connect with study partners:
help match students with a study partner by using questions from this sample questionnaire
direct students to the Learning Strategies Center’s program for finding study partners.
return to top of the page


Identify gaps and normalize getting help
Acknowledge the learning gap with the class: remind students that they are not alone and that uneven preparation for Cornell is not their fault. Many spent part of their junior year and all of their senior year in challenging online settings.
Identify the extent of the gap for your content area: learn what your students do and do not know. You may decide to provide a concept test, practice assessments, or a survey.
Describe ways to overcome challenges and get help:
Share experiences in which you, TAs, or students felt challenged and how you overcame the obstacles.
Let students know that not only is it acceptable to make mistakes, but also that such struggles are an essential part of learning and growing.
Offer several resources for regular help, including TA check-ins, office hours, review sessions, online question-and-answer forums, and the Learning Strategies Center’s programs.
Encourage students to talk about their concerns and struggles.
Emphasize that the earlier instructors and TAs are aware of your situation, the better they are able to support you.
Peer Support: guide students on strategies for helping their peers in positive, supportive ways.  Encourage them to ask for help from a classmate.  When students learn together by explaining concepts to one another, it reinforces their understanding of the material.
return to top of the page


Check-in early and assess often
Alert students early about their progress in the course: students might not even know they are behind, and without early feedback, they may not have an opportunity to remedy the situation before the end of the semester. Help prevent such situations with:
early feedback
displaying grades visibly in Canvas
incorporating opportunities for assistance for those who are struggling
Provide several low stakes assessments and distribute them evenly throughout the semester to give students an opportunity to recover if they have a rough start. This will offer students plenty of opportunities to demonstrate their learning, practice skills, and adapt to academic life at Cornell.
Check-in with students often to see what is working or not, and make modifications to the course based on their feedback.
Ideas include:

checking in during class verbally or with a classroom poll
surveying students with the Mid-Semester Feedback Program
opening up a discussion board
having TAs meet regularly with designated groups
To discuss ideas and strategies for supporting students, visit our online drop-in sessions or contact CTI to set up a consultation.

Due to COVID-related academic disruptions, the incoming class may have significant learning gaps, and instructors must be prepared to provide additional support. To help students adjust to studying at Cornell, instructors can establish connections, identify learning gaps, promote help-seeking behaviors, and continuously monitor progress.

Creating connections is essential, as students are more likely to succeed if they feel connected to their instructor, peers, and content. Instructors can promote interaction through collaborative activities, icebreakers, and facilitating the formation of study groups. Encouraging students to join study groups and offering them tools to find study partners can also help.

Addressing learning gaps involves acknowledging the issue and helping students understand that they are not alone in facing these challenges. Instructors should assess student knowledge and provide methods to overcome difficulties, such as sharing personal experiences, emphasizing the importance of making mistakes, offering multiple support resources, and fostering open communication about struggles. Additionally, promoting peer support by encouraging students to learn from one another can reinforce their understanding of the subject matter.

Lastly, checking in with students frequently and providing assessment opportunities throughout the semester can help track progress and identify areas for improvement. Instructors should give early feedback, display grades visibly, provide low-stakes assessments, and make adjustments to the course based on student feedback. Regular check-ins, surveys, discussion boards, and TA meetings can ensure continuous support for students. Instructors can seek further guidance for supporting students through consultation with Cornell's online resources or the Center for Teaching Innovation.
How to Identifying & addressing learning gaps in large classroom? What research suggests for solving this problem.

Identifying and addressing learning gaps in large classrooms can be challenging, but research suggests several strategies to effectively overcome these obstacles:

1. Formative assessments: Implementing regular, low-stakes assessments helps to identify gaps in student understanding. Examples include quizzes, think-pair-share activities, or concept mapping exercises. These assessments provide valuable insight into students' learning progress and allow instructors to adjust their teaching methods accordingly.

2. Differentiated instruction: Research suggests that tailoring instruction to meet the diverse needs of students helps address learning gaps. This can be done by offering a variety of learning materials, such as videos, readings, and interactive content to cater to different learning styles, and varying the difficulty and complexity of tasks to accommodate different skill levels.

3. Peer-assisted learning: Encourage students to work in pairs or small groups to discuss and solve problems together. Research shows that peer-assisted learning promotes deeper understanding, enhances motivation, and helps address learning gaps as students learn from each other's strengths and weaknesses.

4. Encourage self-reflection: Prompt students to regularly reflect on their own learning process, identify strengths and weaknesses, and set goals for improvement. Self-reflection can be promoted through journaling, self-assessments, or class discussions, and helps students take ownership of their learning.

5. Technology-enhanced learning: Utilize digital platforms and tools to create personalized learning experiences and track individual progress. Adaptive learning systems, for example, can identify knowledge gaps and provide customized instruction to address them, while learning management systems enable instructors to monitor student performance.

6. Provide access to resources: Ensure students have access to additional resources such as tutorials, online resources, or supplementary materials. This allows students to seek help and further their understanding independently, thus bridging learning gaps.

7. Provide constructive feedback: Providing individualized feedback on students' work is essential for addressing learning gaps. In large classrooms, consider using technology such as online grading systems or peer-review platforms to facilitate the feedback process.

8. Professional development: Instructors should continually seek opportunities for professional growth, such as attending workshops or seminars, to stay informed about best practices for addressing learning gaps.

9. Collaboration with colleagues: Work together with fellow instructors to share strategies, resources, and assessment data to collaboratively identify and address learning gaps.

10. Early intervention: Research emphasizes the importance of early identification and intervention for addressing learning gaps. Monitor student performance and engagement from the beginning of the course and provide targeted support to those who may be struggling.

Overall, the key to addressing learning gaps in large classrooms lies in employing various strategies, leveraging technology, and fostering a collaborative and supportive learning environment. By doing so, instructors can better understand their students' needs and work towards creating a more equitable and effective learning experience.

conversation.content:
write me an introduction to an interview with the sales head in decathlon Egypt the introduction should include these topics  —Importance of Selling to the Company,Description of the Sales Force,Training Program for Salespeople,Customer Profiles,Performance Standards and Compensation
,

Today, we are thrilled to have the opportunity to interview the Sales Head of Decathlon Egypt. A renowned sports retailer, Decathlon Egypt is one of the largest sporting goods chains in the world. With a focus on providing high-quality products and exceptional customer service, the company has built a strong reputation in the industry. In this interview, we will delve into the importance of selling to the company, the description of the sales force, the training program for salespeople, customer profiles, performance standards, and compensation. We look forward to gaining insights into the sales strategies that have allowed Decathlon Egypt to excel in a highly competitive industry.
turn this introduction to points

1. Decathlon Egypt is a leading sports retailer that focuses on delivering high-quality products and exceptional customer service.
2. A strong sales strategy is essential for the company's success, making the role of the Sales Head crucial.
3. During the interview, we will discuss several topics, including the importance of selling to the company, the description of the sales force, the training program for salespeople, customer profiles, performance standards, and compensation. 
4. Decathlon Egypt has built a strong reputation in the industry, and we look forward to gaining insights into the sales strategies that have allowed them to excel in such a highly competitive market.

summarize these answers into points -	Describe the product or service and the company.
Decathlon is a sportswear company they sell a variety of different sportwear products. They have around 9 different sports and each sport has its own section in the store. And each sport has three different Levels of products (beginner, intermediate, advanced). They focus on personalized selling. They are always looking for what’s best for their clients. 
-	What are the main competitive (selling) advantages the company has over its competition (i.e., price and value-added new technology)?
Decathlon’s main competitive advantage is that they have a variety of options. They don’t just specialize in one sport they specialize in 9 different sports. They also have an extreme advantage when it comes to pricing. Because their pricing does not only target one segment, but they also have products that fit all three segments with different pricing to fit all. You get good quality for a good price. They want to make spots accessible to everyone regardless of their background or financial means. 
-	What is the general approach to selling? Describe in detail. (Tools and methods)
Decathlon use personal selling as their approach of selling first the customer walks into the store looking for something specific and the sales rep walks with the customer and helps them find what they are looking for after they find what the customer is looking for the sales rep will give the customer all the options offered in the product they want and they will also give them a comparison between the better product and they let the customer decide on which they want after they decide on the product they ask the customer if they need anything else and how a typical sale goes. What the sales rep did hear is called upselling they let customer see the item they want and then they push for the better product 
-	How much of the marketing budget is spent on selling versus advertising?
The marketing budget is spent mainly on advertising because at Decathlon they teach their employees to market their own spot in the store. The sports leader i.e., the sales rep is in charge of everything in their sport for example the placing of the products the pricing of the products and the offers that are put out, but advertising is mainly lead by the communications leader in the store they see what the store needs regarding marketing and they get it done 
-	How many calls/meetings does it take to close a sale? (If any)
As we mentioned earlier decathlon uses personal selling approach, so all sales are made on the floor but that only for B2C customers when it comes to B2B they hold three meeting the first meeting is held to figure out the exact order the customer wants the second meeting is held to negotiate the pricing and logistics and the final meeting is for closing the deal and putting the last touches

1. Decathlon is a sportswear company that sells various sports products across 9 different sports sections, and they offer personalized selling.
2. The main competitive advantage of Decathlon is its variety of options, including different pricing segments, to make sports accessible to everyone, and they focus on providing good quality for a good price.
3. Decathlon's selling approach is personal selling, where the sales representatives guide customers to find what they need and provide options and comparisons before letting customers decide on their purchase. They also use upselling to push customers towards better products.
4. Most of Decathlon's marketing budget is spent on advertising to promote the store but individual employees are responsible for marketing their respective sports sections.
5. For B2C customers, all sales are made on the floor through personalized selling, but for B2B customers, it takes three meetings to close a sale: specification, pricing negotiation, and finalizing the deal.

summarize these answers into points -	How many salespeople does the company have?
Decathlon Egypt has around 6 stores each store has on e store leader and three collective leaders and 9 sport leaders and around 12 sport players. The sports lead role is to manage the store they are in charge of everything then the collective leader is only in charge of their collective which include a sport with its branches like for example Ahmed Khattab is the collective leader for water sports and surfing so he’s in charge of the entire collective. Now for the spot leader they are in charge of one out of the nine sports and the spots player are in the store to help out the customers and the spot leader.  
-	What is the rate of turnover?
The turnover rate for the store is around 65%. So basically 65% of employees leave due to the fact that their contract is only 3 months, and these are usually sports players but the 35% left are stable employees that grow within the company. 
-	Describe in detail the type of salespeople the company seeks when filling positions.
Decathlon usually looks for athletic people with a good sports history and dedication to sports because they will be in a sports atmosphere all the time and they need to make sure that the employees have a good education and truly love and understand sports. 
-	Where do they seek applicants?
They usually look for applicants in universities and former athletes’ online platforms. When seeking applicants’ decathlons main priority is finding the right fit for there company 
-	How do they select the people they think will be the most successful?
They select employees through a three step interview the first interview is a collective interview you sit in a room with around 20 other applicants and they ask you general questions where did you study what’s your sports history what are you accomplishments then they filter the candidates and they move on to the next interview they give you a variety of different products  and they let you choose a product and sell it to the interviewee after that they divide the candidates left into teams and they ask you to formulate a business plan to help a dying business after that you move on to one and one interviews in the one and one interview they ask you very deep questions and based on your responses you get accepted or not.
-	What do they think of testing salespeople?
After the interview process and after you get accepted you don’t get any further testing you just get all the training you need from product selection to sports training to time management training but every three months you have meeting to show your collective leader the progress you made and if you need any help, he tries his best to provide it.  
-	How important is experience?
To decathlon experience in sales doesn’t matter what matters the most is your sports experience because they believe as a company if you know and love what you are selling you will sell it in a very good way and reflects on your love for your sport 
-	What other items on a resume would be important in making the selection?
Decathlon are looking for people who have a good sports history because they truly believe that if you love your sport you will be a great sales representative for this sport, they look for sports history and sports achievements these are the most important items that they look for in a resume 
-	How important are appearance, attitude, social skills, verbal skills, etc.?
Appearance is very important at decathlon you have to look your best and you need to be a well-spoken person you need to be able represent yourself and the brand in a good way while also having good attitude and social skills you need to be able to connect with the customer regardless of their segment you need to know how to speak their language doing so with a smile on your face 
-	Do they ever use “team selling”? Who are the members of the sales team?

In each store you have three teams as in three collectives each team has a collective leader, and each collective leader is in charge of his sports leaders and each sports leader is in charge of his sports players each collective has a turnover goal that they are working towards and they all help each other they all try there best to increase there days turnover by helping out as many customers as they can.

1. Decathlon Egypt has around 6 stores, and each store has store leaders, collective leaders, sport leaders, and sport players.
2. The turnover rate for the store is around 65%, but 35% of employees stay and grow within the company.
3. Decathlon looks for athletic people with a good sports history and dedication to sports who have a good education and truly love and understand sports.
4. Decathlon seeks applicants from universities and athletes' online platforms.
5. The company selects salespeople through a three-step interview process, including a collective interview, product selling simulation, and business plan, followed by a one-on-one interview.
6. Decathlon believes that sports experience is more important than sales experience when selecting salespeople.
7. The most crucial items on a resume include a good sports history and sports achievements.
8. Appearance, attitude, social skills, and verbal skills are essential, as sales representatives need to connect with customers.
9. Each store has three teams, and each team has a collective leader, sport leaders, and sport players. They work together to increase turnover by helping customers.

summarize these answers into points -	Describe in detail the training program for the salespeople.
When you get accepted into the company you first start with building the store. You see the process of building the store and then you start with product training depending on which collective you’ll be working in. Then you start taking safety training. As in fire and safety then you get operations training. Each part of your training will affect your growth in the company and how you respond to each of these training will affect your position in the company. 
-	How much emphasis is placed on product training, sales training, sales automation, 
There is high emphasis on product training because you need to understand exactly what you are selling because when you understand the products you are selling you will be able to upsell the customer and give them the better option and give them a better experience in shopping they don’t put high emphasis on sales training because they believe that you learn through experience when it comes to sales rather than training 
-	motivation, company policy training, and customer behavior training?
Decathlon highly focuses on customer behavior training because when working in decathlon you will be meeting a variety of different customers from different segments. You need to be able to understand their needs and be able to communicate with them, decathlon doesn’t give commissions on sales how they motivate their employees is that they give them a monthly target of sales if they reach them over the entire year, they get a percentage of the turnover. 
Do they use in-house training (by company people) and/or consultant training?
Decathlon uses in house training in most of their training except the first aid training and the fire and safety training they use consulting agencies to perform these training so that their employees can be fully certified. 
-	Where and when do they hold training meetings?
Decathlon usually holds training meeting in the off season so after summer, but it also depends on which collective is taking the training because the off season can change from one collective to another, but they mainly happen all throw-out the year. 
-	Do you divide the salespeople into teams based on the product (i.e., product expert)?
Each sales person is divided into a collective and each collective is a team working to serve a sport and within the sport all sales people are divided based on their understanding of the sport and their experience and for the first couple of weeks they shadow their collective leader to understand how to approach customers and how to sell and upsell each and every customer in this period the collective leader teaches his team all the tricks he knows in order for them to give out the best outcome 
-	Is motivation important to their salespeople? Why? How do they provide motivational training or incentives?
Motivation is a key element in decathlons’ workspace. How they motivate their employees is that they give them a monthly target for sales and if they reach them over the entire year, they get a percentage of the turnover. They also hold monthly sports events and outings to get their employees out of the work pressure. They act as a team and treat everyone equally. They believe that motivation is key to a successful business because you always have to give your employees something to work for 
-	Do they or are they planning to use electronic catalogs to prepare proposals and presentations?
Decathlon already uses electronic catalogs while preparing presentations as they have quarterly meetings. In which they decide on which product lines they will open this year depending on the customer’s needs. Decathlon has used the conversion of technology to the fullest as they launched their application to help the customer out with their shopping.

1. Decathlon's training program begins with building the store, followed by product training, safety training, and operations training.
2. The company places high emphasis on product training to understand the products, which allows for upselling and a better shopping experience for customers.
3. Decathlon highly focuses on customer behavior training to help salespeople effectively communicate and understand customers' needs.
4. In-house training is used for most training, except for first aid and fire and safety training, in which consulting agencies certify employees.
5. Training meetings are held during the off-season and occur throughout the year, depending on the collective.
6. Salespeople are divided into collectives and work as a team towards a sport, and within the sport, they are divided based on their understanding and experience.
7. Motivation is important to Decathlon's salespeople as it provides monthly sales targets and incentives based on turnover. Monthly sports events and outings are also held to relieve work pressure.
8. Decathlon uses electronic catalogs for preparing proposals and presentations and launched their application to help customers shop.

summarize these answers into points
-	How are the prospects/customers located?
Customers are located through an after sales ask in which the cashier asks the customer where they live, and they have an incredibly smart trick in which they ask for you email to give you the warranty receipt on your email what that does is that by having your email they can send you promotions and sales and by asking for your location they can target their ads to your location 
-	Does the company set up booths at trade shows to attract leads?
The company sets up booths only when they’re opening a new store and they also seek booths in athletic events to raise more awareness for the brand they also will open booths at university fares to attract prospective candidates. 
-	How many calls/meetings does the salesperson make in a day or a week?
Salespeople in decathlon don’t make calls but they meet customers all day long they can have up to 30 clients a day and around 150 customers per week. 
-	How are sales potentials/forecasts determined?
Each sport leader has an excel sheet this excel sheet has all the money generated from their sport and they have to forecast 48 weeks of turnovers based on the turnovers of the year before they either set the same numbers or they predict a better number for any of the weeks based on the data they have. 
-	What are the buying motives of a typical buyer?
The buying motives for a typical customer at decathlon is promotions they love promotions and sales. Because decathlon is the only store that offer sales on high value product unscheduled as in the sport leader can see that a certain product is selling very well but there is a limited stock of this item so he can lower its price to half so that the product sells etc. 
-	What is the nature of the typical buyer?
The nature of a typical buyer is that they are an athlete or buying something for an athlete or looking for sports equipment they tend to be very curious about the product that they are asking for and the mainly know what they want and what they need based on their sport of profession or interest. 
-	Do you have a database for customers? How did you build it?
When the customer goes to check out  the cashier asks the customer where they live, and they have an incredibly smart trick in which they ask for your email to give you the warranty receipt on your email what that does is that by having your email they can send you promotions and sales and by asking for your location they can target their ads to your location.  And that creates a full database of customers that is renewed daily and that is extremely reliable.

1. Customers are located through an after-sales ask for location and email to target ads and promotions effectively.
2. The company sets up booths at events such as new store openings, athletic events, and university fares to attract leads.
3. Salespeople meet a high volume of customers all day, with up to 30 clients a day and around 150 customers per week.
4. Sales potentials and forecasts are determined through an excel sheet by each sport leader, with 48-week turnover predictions based on the previous year's data.
5. The typical buying motive of a typical buyer at Decathlon is promotions and sales, and they tend to be athletes or interested in sports equipment.
6. A database of customers is built through asking for their email and location during check out to send promotions and targeted ads effectively.

conversations.facetValue: summarize a text.

allFacetValues.value: hear about a group of survivors after a plane crash, their journey in the jungle, and how they formed a bond and worked together to find help.
English
summarize a text.

conversation.content:
As I approached the guy, I noticed that he looked to be around my age, maybe a little older. I wracked my brain trying to remember his name from the brief introduction on the plane. “Hey, um, Grigolopoulos?” I ventured, hoping I hadn’t gotten his name wrong.

He turned and gave me a small smile. “Close, it’s Grigoropoulos,” he corrected me. “And you’re…?”

“Olivia,” I responded, feeling a little embarrassed. “Do you have any idea where we are, or what happened?”

	Grigoropoulos shook his head, his expression turning more serious. “I think the plane went down. The last thing I remember is a loud explosion and then… well, this jungle.” He glanced around at the unfamiliar surroundings.

“We need to find the others, if there are any others,” I said urgently. “Who knows if they’re injured or even worse.”

	Grigoropoulos nodded, and together we began to search the area for any sign of more survivors. We ventured deeper into the jungle, calling out for the rest of our group. The occasional panicked response gave us motivation to continue, and eventually we found a cluster of our fellow passengers.

	There was Aria, a shy girl with a knack for navigation; Ben, the silent but strong type; and Chloe, who, despite her fear, was determined to maintain a positive attitude. We instantly bonded over our shared circumstances, forming a tight-knit group determined to find our way out of this strange rainforest.

	After everyone caught their breath and checked for injuries, we decided to try and find the remnants of the plane, hoping for any supplies or perhaps even a working radio. It took us a few hours of trekking through the dense foliage, but eventually, we stumbled upon the wreckage. The sight of mangled metal and shredded seats made us all shudder, grateful that we had even survived such a catastrophic event.

	We scavenged what we could from the wreckage, including a couple of backpacks, some water bottles, and even a first aid kit. No sign of a functioning radio, though. Disappointed but not defeated, our little group decided to continue searching for civilization.

	Days turned into weeks, and we slowly began to adapt to our new reality. Aria’s navigation skills became invaluable as she mapped out our little corner of the rainforest, helping us find important resources like water and shelter. Ben’s strength allowed us to build makeshift treehouses to keep us off the ground and away from potential predators. Chloe took it upon herself to learn about the various edible plants, berries, and insects that could keep us nourished. As for Grigoropoulos and I, we tackled the task of searching for help and were constantly on the lookout for rescue parties.

	Our days in the rainforest melded into a hazy routine filled with grim determination. Then, one day, as we were out scouting, Grigoropoulos and I noticed the faint sound of a helicopter in the distance. We instantly signaled the others, and together we all waved our improvised flags, desperately trying to catch the attention of our potential saviors.

	As the Brazilian helicopter’s approach grew closer, we all looked at each other, the relief and hope settling over us like a warm embrace. No matter what happened next, we knew that we had forged a bond that could only come through surviving the unexpected together. And as we prepared to be rescued, each of us knew that we had found something truly special in the depths of the rainforest: a family.

try removing around 100 words from this text from a short story with keeping the same topic and theme

As I approached him, I tried to remember his name from our introduction on the plane. “Hey, um, Grigolopoulos?”

He corrected me with a smile, “Grigoropoulos.” 

“I’m Olivia. Do you know what happened?”

He shook his head. “I think the plane went down. We should find the others.”

We searched the jungle, finding Aria, Ben, and Chloe. Together, we scavenged the wreckage for supplies and decided to keep searching for civilization.

Weeks passed. Aria's navigation helped us find resources, Ben's strength provided shelter, Chloe discovered edible plants, while Grigoropoulos and I searched for help. One day, we heard a helicopter and waved our improvised flags. As our rescuers arrived, we knew we had formed a family through survival.

conversation.content: Перефразируй этот текст: "провёл ещё и ещё, а потом ещё анализ, а потом ещё. Много писать, много информации. В двух словах: как оказалось они не заплатили по бондам, 300 млн которые им надо собрать с рынка, (опять непонятно собрали они или нет) должны уйти кредиторам. Когда компания не платит кредиторам сосчитайте банкрот. Далее, пусть они найдут соберут 300 млн. $, оплатят, а дальше что? Есть компания Зола, так вот компания эта отметила рост продаж той продукции которая торговала диваны. Скорее всего клиенты увидев и услышав что у компании проблемы, тупо ушли в Золу. Куча пар которые организовывали свадьбы через диваны, ОТКАЗАЛИСЬ, ссылавшись на опасение банкротства. Да и при такой цене акции, отсутствии покупателя, и объёма в 40млн$ в день, пробитие всех уровней поддержки, это наталкивает меня на мысль что надо выходить из позиции. Риск стал слишком высоким. Даже не знаю как можно выбраться из такой ямы, плюс с такой меткой о банкротстве. Они борются с банкротством, могут всякое сказать и пообещать, но лично я не думаю что тут есть что-то, что может протолкнуть акцию. По-хорошему надо выходить. Ставить уведомления, если увидим обьемы, новости, отчеты, тогда можно будет брать, можно еще подождать дня три и убедиться что тренд развернулся. Буду смотреть завтра что и как буду думать выходить. Средняя у меня сейчас 0,80. 1/3 свои денег вывел, есть еще но усреднять не собираюсь больше. Как-то так."

Провел много анализов и изучил огромное количество информации. Вкратце: выяснилось, что компания не оплатила долг по бондам, и ей нужно собрать с рынка 300 млн долларов, которые должны уйти кредиторам. Если компания не платит кредиторам, то есть все основания считать ее банкротом. Но даже если они найдут 300 млн и заплатят долг, что дальше? Зола, конкурирующая компания, сообщила о росте продаж похожей продукции. Скорее всего, клиенты, узнав о проблемах в компании, перешли к Золе. Многие пары, планирующие свадьбы, ОТКАЗАЛИСЬ от сотрудничества из-за опасений банкротства.

Учитывая текущую стоимость акций, отсутствие покупателей, объем сделок в 40 млн долларов в день и то, что пробиты все уровни поддержки, мне кажется, что пора выходить из позиции. Риск стал слишком высоким. Непонятно, как спастись из такой ситуации, особенно с учетом слухов о банкротстве. Даже если компания будет бороться, я не верю, что есть что-то, что может позволить акциям расти. Лучше выйти из позиции, следить за объемами, новостями, отчетами и возможно вернуться, если тренд изменится.

Буду следить за ситуацией и, возможно, выйти из позиции завтра. Сейчас моя средняя стоимость 0,80. Вывел 1/3 своих денег, остальные пока оставлю, но не планирую докупать акции.

conversation.content: 人才对于国家的意义，高校对于人才的重要，数字化转型对于高校改革的作用。把这三者的关系的串成一段100字的文章引言。
人才一直是国家发展的关键因素，而高校作为人才的摇篮和培养基地，发挥着至关重要的作用。随着数字化转型的兴起，高校也面临着相应的改革和挑战。数字化转型为高校提供了更多创新和教学手段，有效地提升了人才培养质量和水平。因此，这三者之间的关系紧密相连，相辅相成，共同推进着各自的发展。
人才、高校
和数字化转型是当今社会中的热门话题，它们之间的关系相辅相成，是实现国家发展和高等教育现代化的必要条件。高校是人才培养的重要场所，数字化转型为高校提供了更加先进的教学手段和管理工具，能够提高学校的效率和质量，更好地为人才的培养做出贡献。在未来的发展中，数字化转型将会在更广泛的领域中发挥其重要作用，助力高校和国家走向更加繁荣的未来。
人才、高校、数字化转型、钉钉为关键词，改写一段100字内的文章引言，要求生动形象且有深度。
在当今竞争激烈的社会中，人才是一国之重要资源，高校是人才的重要培养场所，而数字化转型为高校带来了前所未有的机遇和挑战。作为全球领先的数字化平台，钉钉不仅在教学与管理方面为高校提供了更加高效的解决方案，同时也使得学生和教师之间的交流变得更加紧密和便捷。数字化转型为高校增加了一种全新的教育方式，尤其在当前的时代背景下，该方式已变得日益重要，为高校在国内外竞争中抢先占领市场提供了重要的支持。
在生动一点

https://study.com/learn/lesson/what-is-a-hung-jury.html

The website explains the concept of a "hung jury" in criminal trials. It defines a hung jury as a situation where the jury is unable to reach a unanimous or majority decision on the defendant's guilt or innocence. The website further discusses the reasons that may lead to a hung jury, the consequences of a hung jury, and the potential outcomes of a retrial following a hung jury verdict. Additionally, the website provides examples of high-profile cases where the juries could not reach a consensus.
bullet summary the following:
I apologize, but you haven't provided me with any text, article, or website to bullet point. Please provide me with more information to proceed.

When the prosecution and defense teams have presented all of their evidence, the jury must deliberate and try to reach a verdict on the case. Most often, a unanimous jury decision is needed. If the case is a federal court case, the jury must agree on the verdict unanimously. This means that all jurors must participate in the verdict and all must agree on either a guilty or not guilty ruling. If this does not happen, it is a hung jury. Almost every state in the United States requires a jury in a state criminal trial to reach a unanimous verdict. As with federal court cases, if the jury can't agree, it is a hung jury. In either case, in the event of a hung jury, the following may happen:

The judge might ask the jury to deliberate further
The judge may allow an extra hearing which will allow the jurors to pose questions to the involved parties
A judge may immediately declare a mistrial, meaning the trial was inconclusive
When all avenues perused in assisting the jury to make a decision doesn't work, a judge may declare a mistrial
If a hung jury causes a mistrial in a criminal case, the prosecutor has the discretion to dismiss the charges, offer a plea bargain to the defendant, or choose to try the case again. If there is a hung jury in a civil case, the judge can order that the case be re-tried. When a judge asks the jurors in a hung jury to deliberate further, the instructions given by the judge to the jury are called the Allen charge. The purpose of this is to encourage the jury to reach a unanimous verdict if at all possible. The original text of the Allen Charge was approved for use in 1896, but there have been variations to the text since. A number of these variations have been declared unconstitutional because they were deemed to be coercive. Some judges may opt for their own version of the Allen charge, but will run the risk of accusations of influencing jurors. In general, most Allen Charge scripts will include some form of the following:

Reminding the jury that trials are expensive and if the case were to be tried again, the trial would only add to this expense
Asking those who are not in favor of a conviction (if the majority are in favor of a conviction) to ask themselves if their doubt is reasonable because the doubts do not seem to make an impression on the other jury members
A reminder that no juror should give up any of their beliefs as they pertain to the actual evidence of the trial
A reminder that there is no time limit on deliberations and to take all the time necessary to reach a verdict

- A unanimous verdict is typically required in criminal trials, with some states allowing for a majority verdict.
- If the jury cannot agree on a verdict, it is a hung jury and several options are available. 
- A judge may ask the jury to continue deliberations or declare a mistrial, after which the prosecutor may dismiss charges or retry the case in the event of a criminal hung jury. A hung jury in a civil case may result in a ruling for a retrial. 
- An Allen charge may be given to encourage the jurors to reach a unanimous decision, although caution must be used to avoid coercive language. 
- The charge may include reminders about the expense of a retrial, urging the minority to reexamine their positions, and noting that there is no time limit to reach a decision.

conversation.content:
Summarize the follow text with its keypoints:Upon entering Vault 91, all of the Vault Dwellers would be put on a mandatory daily drug regiment, to be administered by a small group of Mister Orderlies that also act as helpers to any human medical staff present. The residents will be told that the drugs they are taking are to help protect them against potential radiation poisoning, but the true purpose of the drugs is far more sinister. In fact, not all residents will be getting the same chemical cocktail to begin with.

The women of Vault 91 will be given an experimental growth treatment which will make them grow taller and stronger, maxing out at a bit over seven feet tall on average. Of course, this won't make them lose any of their femininity: in fact, in some test subjects those same growth hormones may even increase the size of their hips, butt, and bust on top of everything else. However, these drugs also have the side effect of damaging certain areas of the brain dealing with critical thinking and memory retention, effectively making the female population of the Vault become dumber as they continue to grow.

The men of Vault 91 will be given a series of drugs that will do pretty much the exact opposite. Their memory retention and critical thinking skills will increase during their treatment, increasing intelligence for them across the board, but these same drugs will also stunt their growth and make it harder to build and maintain muscle mass, eventually making the male population smarter but physically smaller and weaker than their female counterparts, with a final projected height of around four feet.

The purpose of this experiment, at least in the eyes of Vault-Tec, would be twofold. The first would be to test the effectiveness of these drugs in general, and see if the potential benefits of each may outweigh their downsides. The second would be a sociological experiment to see which of the two genders would take control of the Vault once the drug treatments reach their final outcome. Will the stronger but dumber women use their physical strength to intimidate and strong-arm the men into serving their desires? Or will the weaker but smarter men convince the women of the Vault to let them do all of the thinking, and that it is in their best interest to follow any orders given to them by a man. Perhaps the two groups may even manage to find a balance that lets them maintain a surprisingly high level of gender equality despite the new size and intelligence gap between the two of them. In essence, Vault-Tec wants to figure out whether brains or brawn would win out if they were both pushed to an unnatural extreme.

Vault 91 residents are put on a daily drug regimen, administered by Mister Orderlies. Women are given an experimental growth treatment that makes them taller and stronger but damages their critical thinking and memory retention. Men receive drugs that increase their intelligence but stunt their growth and weaken their physical strength. The experiment aims to test the effectiveness of these drugs and observe which gender takes control in the society. Vault-Tec wants to determine whether brains or brawn would win if pushed to extremes.

Follow the daily life of one these few men on the vault with the men on top

Chapter One: The Unexpected Consequence

Beneath the scorched lands of the American wasteland, Vault 91 hummed with life. It was over two centuries since its massive blast-door sealed shut, unseen and hidden, just as Vault-Tec designed it. The inhabitants of the underground haven were now into their fifth generation, and the world outside lay almost forgotten, filled with nothing but nightmares and ghost stories.

David, a young man barely in his twenties, navigated the steel-clad corridors of Vault 91, making his way to the medical bay for his daily appointment. Vault life always had a certain rhythm to it, much like the metronome of the Vault-Tec drug experiment that began upon the vault's sealing.

The truth about the experiment was still hidden, as the drugs had appeared to seemingly have no effect on David's predecessors. But, as time passed and generations of children were born into the vault, the changes became evident. With every new generation, the women grew taller and stronger, while the men, albeit highly intelligent, were dwarved and weakened.

This particular morning, as if anticipating the unforeseen revelations that lay ahead, David felt a pang of awkward unease ripple down his spine. He took his seat in the medical bay, waiting for his daily serum dose. Around him, the futuristic Mister Orderlies buzzed with precision, each pill and injection administered perfectly.

"Good morning, David," Dr. Amelia Greene, the Head Physician, greeted him warmly. She was now well over seven feet tall, like many of the fifth-generation women of Vault 91. Her long limbs moved gracefully as she prepared David's medication. "Just the usual dose today, but keep an eye on any changes, alright?"

David smiled, hiding his discomfort. "Of course, Dr. Greene," he replied, taking the small pill from her colossal hand.

Today, however, as he swallowed the pill, David couldn't help but let his mind meander to the memories of his grandfather's stories. He grew up hearing about the first generations in Vault 91 – men and women of equal height and strength, working together in harmony. As a child, he found the stories fantastical, mythical even.

The new dynamics of life in the Vault grew complex, as men became increasingly rare with each generation, creating an undeniable shift in balance. While no open conflicts plagued the vault, a power struggle bubbled beneath the surface of social interactions.

For David, being one of the few remaining males, life carried a significant burden. His intellectual prowess granted him a place among the vault's leaders, but he couldn't shake the feeling of being seen as more of a commodity than an equal in this new world.

As the day wound to a close and David returned to his assigned quarters, he was greeted by Sarah, his assigned mate. She stood with a tentativeness that seemed out of place for her towering stature, eyes filled with both affection and humility.

"How was your day?" she asked hesitantly.

David sighed, running a hand through his hair. "It was fine," he replied, keeping the secret unease to himself. "Just another day in Vault 91."

Sarah nodded, understanding the unspoken weight on his fraught shoulders. As the lights dimmed and the hum of the vault lulled its inhabitants to sleep, both David and Sarah felt the invisible walls of the experiment close in around them.

Yet, hope glimmered on the horizon. Rumors began to circulate that Vault-Tec hubs in the external wasteland were falling into dysfunction, allowing the residents of other vaults to rebuild and integrate into a new world outside. A resurgence of curiosity and a yearning for freedom quivered in the hearts of Vault 91's dwellers.

What would happen if the experiment controlling their lives were brought to an end? Would the balance swing back in their favor, or had Vault-Tec's meddling gone too far? Only time would reveal the answers, as David and his fellow dwellers cautiously ventured towards an uncertain future, the echoes of the mysterious experiment lingering within the walls of Vault 91.

summarise this: The personal name Ἑρμάνουβιϲ and related forms are usually subsumed under the category of "polytheophoric" names characteristic of Roman Egypt. These are names that combine the names of two deities, such as Ἡρακλαπόλλων or Ἑρμαντίνοοϲ. They are attested solely in the Roman period, especially between the second and the fourth centuries, and were predominantly popular among males of the middle and upper classes in certain metropoleis like Hermopolis.[1] The name Ἑρμάνουβιϲ, however, though formally combining two divine names, is somewhat special: unlike other polytheophoric names, it refers to a specific deity that is independently attested in Roman Egypt. In other words, it is the name of the god himself that is a "polytheophoric" formation, and this has some consequences on how the personal names based on this deity are formed. Before discussing these names, it is appropriate first to give a brief summary of our state of knowledge about Hermanubis. After reviewing the name forms based on this deity, the onomastic evidence will be related and compared to his iconographical and documentary attestations.

The personal name Ἑρμάνουβιϲ and its variants are considered "polytheophoric" names, which combine two deities' names and were common in Roman Egypt between the 2nd and 4th centuries. They were mainly popular among middle and upper-class males in certain cities like Hermopolis. However, Ἑρμάνουβιϲ is unique as it refers to a specific deity that is independently attested in Roman Egypt; the god's name itself is a polytheophoric formation. A review of name forms based on this deity will include comparing onomastic evidence, iconography, and documentary attestations.

summarise this: The divine name Ἑρμάνουβιϲ is known from a handful of epigraphic and literary sources, mostly of the Roman period.[2] Plutarch cites the name as a designation of Anubis in his underworldly aspect (De Is. et Os. 375e), while Porphyry refers to Hermanubis as ϲύνθετοϲ, "composite," and μιξέλλην, "half-Greek" (De imaginibus fr. 8, p. 18.1–2 Bidez). The name has been restored in a second-century BC dedicatory inscription from Delos (ID 2156.2 [Ἑρ]μανού[βιδι νικ]ηφόρωι), which would be its earliest attestation, but otherwise it appears in three inscriptions of the Roman period, two from Egypt and one from Thessalonike (see below). It is clear that the name is a result of the assimilation of the Egyptian god Anubis to the Greek god Hermes, which is well attested in a number of literary, epigraphic, and artistic sources.[3] Although Hermes was traditionally equated with the Egyptian Thoth, his function as psychopompos encouraged his association with Anubis given the latter's comparable funerary role in Egyptian religion as embalmer and guardian of the dead and as leader of the deceased to the tribunal of Osiris. This assimilation resulted in widespread Graeco-Roman representations of the canine-headed Anubis with attributes of the Greek Hermes, such as the distinctive staff known as the kerykeion or winged sandals.[4] As far as I know, none of these representations whose provenance is known was found in Egypt, though this may be due to mere chance.[5] But in Roman Alexandria there emerges a new iconographical type, well represented in coins and sculpture, in which a fully anthropomorphic young god is flanked by a dog and holds the same attributes as the said Anubis, in addition to wearing the calathos headdress.[6] It is this type that art historians have traditionally labeled "Hermanubis." In making this identification, they have been encouraged by Porphyry's statement about the god's "composite" and "half-Hellenic" character. However, it is important to stress that the reference to the fully anthropomorphic type as "Hermanubis" is only a hypothetical convention, and that not a single of the numerous representations of this type bears a legend or inscription identifying it as such.[7] I will return to this question at the end of the paper in light of the onomastic evidence.

summarise this: The divine name Ἑρμάνουβιϲ is known from a handful of epigraphic and literary sources, mostly of the Roman period.[2] Plutarch cites the name as a designation of Anubis in his underworldly aspect (De Is. et Os. 375e), while Porphyry refers to Hermanubis as ϲύνθετοϲ, "composite," and μιξέλλην, "half-Greek" (De imaginibus fr. 8, p. 18.1–2 Bidez). The name has been restored in a second-century BC dedicatory inscription from Delos (ID 2156.2 [Ἑρ]μανού[βιδι νικ]ηφόρωι), which would be its earliest attestation, but otherwise it appears in three inscriptions of the Roman period, two from Egypt and one from Thessalonike (see below). It is clear that the name is a result of the assimilation of the Egyptian god Anubis to the Greek god Hermes, which is well attested in a number of literary, epigraphic, and artistic sources.[3] Although Hermes was traditionally equated with the Egyptian Thoth, his function as psychopompos encouraged his association with Anubis given the latter's comparable funerary role in Egyptian religion as embalmer and guardian of the dead and as leader of the deceased to the tribunal of Osiris. This assimilation resulted in widespread Graeco-Roman representations of the canine-headed Anubis with attributes of the Greek Hermes, such as the distinctive staff known as the kerykeion or winged sandals.[4] As far as I know, none of these representations whose provenance is known was found in Egypt, though this may be due to mere chance.[5] But in Roman Alexandria there emerges a new iconographical type, well represented in coins and sculpture, in which a fully anthropomorphic young god is flanked by a dog and holds the same attributes as the said Anubis, in addition to wearing the calathos headdress.[6] It is this type that art historians have traditionally labeled "Hermanubis." In making this identification, they have been encouraged by Porphyry's statement about the god's "composite" and "half-Hellenic" character. However, it is important to stress that the reference to the fully anthropomorphic type as "Hermanubis" is only a hypothetical convention, and that not a single of the numerous representations of this type bears a legend or inscription identifying it as such.[7] I will return to this question at the end of the paper in light of the onomastic evidence.

This assimilation led to artistic representations of Anubis with attributes of Hermes, like the kerykeion and winged sandals. A new iconographic type called "Hermanubis" emerged in Roman Alexandria which depicted a young, anthropomorphic god accompanied by a dog and wearing the calathos headdress. However, it's important to note that the term "Hermanubis" is a hypothetical convention and none of the existing representations have inscriptions identifying them as such. summarise this: There are three forms of the personal name based on Hermanubis in papyri and inscriptions from Egypt, in addition to two "proper" polytheophoric names. (In four instances [1, 5, 17, 21] the ending of the name is abbreviated or not preserved.) The form Ἑρμάνουβιϲ, attested six times (2, 9, 11, 13, 14, 15), simply replicates the god's name without further ado, through the phenomenon of "direct theonymy" (the giving to humans of unaltered divine names) that became widespread in the Roman period.[8] In an odd instance (9) the form Ἑρμανουβιϲ in the nominative is borne by a woman, an Alexandrian nurse (ἡ τροφόϲ).[9] It is highly unusual for female theophoric names to be unmarked for gender in this way.[10] I suspect that because the element -ανουβιϲ in Ἑρμάνουβιϲ was often declined with a dental declension in -ιδ-, it might have been conflated with the similar declension of Greek feminine names in -ίϲ, -ίδοϲ.[11] If this is correct, it may be preferable to read the nurse's name as an oxytone (Ἑρμανουβίϲ). There are two further forms based on the god Hermanubis: Ἑρμανουβᾶϲ (six instances: 3, 4, 7, 8, 12, 20) and Ἑρμανουβίων (four instances: 3, 6, 18, 19). -ᾶϲ and -ίων were, in fact, the commonest Greek suffixes for personal names based on the Egyptian god Ἄνουβιϲ.[12] It is interesting that in a business letter (3) the two forms Ἑρμανουβίων (l.38) and Ἑρμανουβᾶϲ (l.41) are used interchangeably to designate the same individual. In this case, Ἑρμανουβᾶϲ is probably a hypocoristic of Ἑρμανουβίων, since the suffix -ᾶϲ often served this purpose.[13]

The first form, Ἑρμάνουβιϲ, occurs six times and exhibits "direct theonymy," the practice of giving humans unaltered divine names. Interestingly, an instance of a woman having this form is found, which is unusual as female theophoric names are typically gender-marked. Two additional forms based on Hermanubis are Ἑρμανουβᾶϲ (six instances) and Ἑρμανουβίων (four instances). These were the most common Greek suffixes for personal names based on the Egyptian god Ἄνουβιϲ. In one business letter, the forms Ἑρμανουβίων and Ἑρμανουβᾶϲ were used interchangeably for the same person, with Ἑρμανουβᾶϲ possibly being a hypocoristic of Ἑρμανουβίων.

Тема: Польза зимнего плавания

Зимнее плавание – это не только экстремальное занятие, но и быстрый и эффективный способ укрепить своё здоровье. В холодную воду плюнуть не каждый решится, зато получившие удовольствие от этого процесса скорее всего не остановятся на одной разовой попытке.

Во-первых, зимнее плавание отлично укрепляет иммунитет и профилактирует многие заболевания. Холодная вода становится мощным стимулятором для работы гормональной системы, питания клеток, а также эффектно сбивает стресс и усталость. С каждым зимним обходом водоема мы укрепляем свой организм и приобретаем уверенность в своих возможностях.

Во-вторых, зимнее плавание – идеальное средство для борьбы с недостатком энергии и депрессией. Купальщик получает мощную дозу эндорфинов и экстренно обновляет свой внутренний ресурс. С людьми, занимающимися плаванием в зимний период, связывается также культ мужества и силы духа. Это мы понимаем, когда уже пробуем себя на преграде и наблюдаем за смелыми пловцами на дистанциях.

В-третьих, зимнее плавание объединяет людей. Друзья и коллеги собираются на льду каждое воскресенье, чтобы общаться, плавать и поддерживать друг друга. Возможно, это не массовый способ проведения своего досуга, но он предполагает общение в приятной атмосфере, способствующей запоминающимся впечатлениям и порциям жизненной энергии.

conversation.content: Quiero que me hagas un resumen  de 109 palabras de la época griega

La época griega abarcó desde el siglo VIII a.C. hasta el IV a.C. y fue una de las más importantes de la civilización occidental. Durante este periodo, los griegos experimentaron una gran evolución en arte, literatura, política, filosofía, ciencias y deportes. La creencia en los dioses era el centro de la cultura griega y la ciudad-estado era el modelo político. Atenas y Esparta fueron las principales ciudades-estado y se caracterizaron por tener sistemas políticos muy distintos. La guerra del Peloponeso (431-404 a.C.) fue un conflicto importante en la época que causó gran destrucción y debilitó a las ciudades-estado. La filosofía griega fue una de las mayores contribuciones de la época, con filósofos como Sócrates, Platón y Aristóteles que sentaron las bases del pensamiento occidental. La época griega terminó con la conquista de Alejandro Magno en el siglo IV a.C. y dejó un legado cultural invaluable.
